messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI SeeCoder nodes?
The ComfyUI SeeCoder nodes are experimental WIP nodes that allow you to use SeeCoders with ComfyUI.
Where can you find the SeeCoders?
The SeeCoders can be found at https://huggingface.co/shi-labs/prompt-free-diffusion and need to be placed at 'models/seecoders'.
What is the function of the SEECoderImageEncode node?
The SEECoderImageEncode node is used to create an embedding from an image.
What inputs does the SEECoderImageEncode node require?
The SEECoderImageEncode node requires the image to encode and the name of the seecoder as inputs.
What is the purpose of the ConcatConditioning node?
The ConcatConditioning node is used to concat different embeddings together, allowing you to create both a text and a visual embedding and concat them.
What inputs does the ConcatConditioning node require?
The ConcatConditioning node requires a set of embeddings to concat something to (conditioning_to) and the embedding to concat behind those (conditioning_from) as inputs.
What are the pending tasks for the ComfyUI SeeCoder nodes?
The pending tasks for the ComfyUI SeeCoder nodes include supporting non-safetensor formats and aligning the attention layers with the ones used in ComfyUI.
